name: FINE TIME FOR A MOVIE: GREAT TO BE BACK IN A MOVIE THEATRE
name_original: FINE TIME FOR A MOVIE: GREAT TO BE BACK IN A MOVIE THEATRE
description:
THE YEAR IS 2020. COVID-19 CONTINUES TO SWEEP THROUGH THE GLOBE, SHUTTING DOWN BUSINESSES... DEVESTATING THE LIVE MUSIC SCENE... EVICERATING THE MOVIE INDUSTRY... BUT ONE MOVIE IS SET TO BRING THE WORLD BACK TOGETHER AGAIN... TO ENTERTAIN... TO ENTHRALL... TO BLOW THEIR FUCKIN MINDS... AND ONE SELF DESCRIBED CINEPHILE IS DETERMINED TO SEE IT... IN A THEATER.

GREAT TO BE BACK IN A MOVIE THEATER

A sequel to Fine Time For A Burger, play as a randomized movie goer, find your seat, enjoy your movie snacks and try not to get COVID! Each character has a set of wants for their movie experience and you'll need to help them achieve it so they give this movie the elusive 5 stars on the beloved cinephile website, 4x3D! Return to the movies multiple times to complete challenge cards to unlock the secret ending!
